DOC.brief_summary: In patient receive implant esthetic zone , would use new Nano hybrid ceramic crown material ( Crystal Ultra ) improve esthetic patient satisfaction peri-implant tissue success compare Lithium Disilicate crown ( E-max ) ?
DOC.brief_title: Patient Satisfaction Peri-Implant Tissue Success Hybrid Ceramic Versus E-Max Superstructures
DOC.detailed_description: The patient treat visit designate follow : Visit 1 : Preoperative record , face-to-face adherence reminder session , sign consent , clinical , radiographic examination primary impression diagnostic cast construction . Visit 2 : ( first stage surgery ) : implant placement surgical procedure postoperative radiograph . Visit 3 : After 3months ( second stage surgery ) : re-opening surgical site , placement heal abutment temporary crown . Visit 4 : After 2 week , remove temporary restoration take final impression Visit 5 : placement different ceramic crown superstructure record different outcome value .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Age 18 year least one tooth miss esthetic area . 2 . Available bone implant placement : A. Labial Palatal Plate bone less 2mm . B. Mesio distal dimension less 6.5mm . C. Bone length less 9mm . 3 . Patient good oral hygiene . 4 . Class 1 occlusion . 5 . Lack excessive parafunctional activity lead implant failure . 6 . Tooth extract less 6 month . 1 . Young patient jaw still grow . ( Less 18 year ) . 2 . Jaw pathology . 3 . Smokers . 4 . Uncontrolled Diabetic particularly insulindependent . 5 . Radiotherapy neck face . 6 . Multiple loss teeth may indicate complicated procedure .
